mapper.sql: id as pid, create_time, deleted, modify_time, pay_money, task_id, hr_company_id, hr_company_name, hotel_id, hotel_name, worker_id, worker_name, pay_type
mapper.select: select b.*,c.name as hrCompanyName,c.logo as hrCompanyLogo FROM bill b left join company c on b.hr_company_id = c.id WHERE b.task_id = #{hotelTaskID} and b.hr_company_id = #{hrCompanyId} and b.hotel_id = #{hotelId} order by b.create_time desc

select b.*,c.name as hrCompanyName,c.logo as hrCompanyLogo,u.nickname as workerName,u.avatar as workerAvatar FROM bill b inner join company c on b.hr_company_id = c.id left join user u on b.worker_id = u.worker_id WHERE b.task_hr_id = #{hrCompanyTaskId} and b.hr_company_id = #{hrCompanyId} and b.worker_id = #{workerId} order by create_time desc
